name: @rbxts/rust-classes
description: Typescript implementations of Rust's std types

scripts.test: npm run test-types && npm run build && npm run test-link && npm run test-compile && npm run test-rojo && npm run test-run
scripts.test-link: npm link && cd tests && npm link @rbxts/rust-classes
scripts.dev-add-version: copy package.json package-temp.json & for /F "tokens=*" %n IN ('git rev-parse --short HEAD') DO (cat package.json | jq --tab ".version |= . + \"-dev-%n\"" > package-new.json & move package-new.json package.json)
scripts.dev-publish: npm run dev-add-version && npm publish --tag next & npm run dev-undo-version

author: Dionysusnu
